pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package is composed of 'dynamixel_tool', 'dynamixel_driver' and 'dynamixel_multi_driver' class. The 'dynamixel_tool' class loads the information of Dynamixel stored in '.device' files. The 'dynamixel_driver' class which is based on dynamixel_sdk provides functions to control an Dynamixel. The 'dynamixel_multi_driver' class which is inherited by 'dynamixel_driver' class provides functions to control Dynamixels.
